publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1551 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee reports to the Justice 2 Committee by 17 September 2004 on the Advice and Assistance (Scotland) Amendment (No. 2) Regulations 2004 Amendment Regulations 2004 (SSI 2004/305). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
